DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria exercise intervention cohort : 11.020.9 year old overweight obese family history diabetes ( primary secondary relative ) sport exercise program ( 3 few day per week moderatetovigorous intensity physical activity , MVPA ) prior 3 month Tanner stage 2 Inclusion Criteria reference group cohort : 11.020.9 year old normal weight For low physical activity subgroup : sport exercise program ( 3 few day per week MVPA ) prior 3 month For high physical activity subgroup : > 30 minute structure MVPA > 3 days/week precede 3 month Tanner stage 2 Exclusion Criteria participant : metabolic , endocrine , cardiovascular , kidney disease orthopedic problem limit physical activity medication treatment would interfere outcomes interpretation smoke tobacco use alcohol illicit drug use pregnancy
